tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText: If any provision or provisions of these Terms of Use shall be held to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
